DOC.detailed_description: Study control clinical trial participant randomize 3 group : GROUP A ( costal mobilization technique Manual Diaphragm Release Technique ) , GROUP B ( Manual Diaphragm Release Technique ) , GROUP C ( Sham ) . After initial evaluation , participant undergo six session care accord randomization reevaluate 3 follow situation : immediately first session , end treatment one week last session . The evaluation perform Optoelectronic plethysmography , Ultrasound 6-minutes walk test .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis COPD ( spirometry FEV1 < 80 % FEV1 / FVC < 0.7 ) sex , undergo another physiotherapeutic treatment , 70 year age , clinically stable without exacerbation last 6 week .
